snippet: After as series of rather monotonous interview sessions Thursday, Madden Bowl offered a respite where the players were relaxed and just having fun. Of course, the stakes were slightly lower.
abstract: After as series of rather monotonous interview sessions Thursday, Madden Bowl offered a respite where the players were relaxed and just having fun. Of course, the stakes were slightly lower.
lead_paragraph: INDIANAPOLIS--After a series of rather monotonous interview sessions Thursday, Madden Bowl offered a respite where the players were relaxed and just having fun.

headline.main: Madden Bowl: Lower Stakes, More Arguing
